meta.title: Tocify · Add Bookmarks & Table of Contents to PDF in browser within minutes - Free Online
meta.description: Free online tool to add clickable bookmarks and table of contents to PDF files. AI-powered outline generator for scanned documents. Private & browser-based.

msg.pdf_loaded: Pdf loaded, long press and drag to select ToC pages

toc.prompt_intro:
The 'AI Format' button is used when the book lacks a scanned table of contents. Paste the unformatted text into the box, and it will intelligently convert it to the target format.

Alternatively, you can use the following prompt to generate the formatted text yourself:

1 Food Categories I Love 1
2 Fruits 2
2.1 Strawberry 3

Reformat the table of contents below into the target format and remove unnecessary comments 

${YOUR_TOCS_COPY_FROM_ANYWHERE}

tooltip.generate_ai: Generate ToC from selected pages using AI
tooltip.switch_edit: Switch to Edit Mode (Show Original PDF)
tooltip.switch_preview: Switch to Preview Mode (Show Generated PDF)

dropzone.title: Upload Your PDF
dropzone.subtitle: Drag & drop a file here, or

offset.title: Confirm Page Offset By The First ToC Item
offset.instruction: Select the physical page where this section actually begins

seo.why_desc: Tocify is an open-source free online tool for adding bookmarks / Table of Contents (ToC) to your PDF files. Whether you have scanned documents or eBooks, our AI-powered solution formats and inserts bookmarks in minutes, making your PDFs easy to navigate.
seo.feature_1_desc: Automatically detect and format ToC structure from scanned pages.
seo.feature_2_desc: Easily organize chapters with our intuitive drag-and-drop interface.
seo.feature_3_desc: Files are processed locally in your browser. No data is uploaded to our servers.
seo.how_step_2: Select the page range containing the directory.
seo.how_step_3: Click 'Generate' to let AI extract the structure.
seo.how_step_4: Edit manually if needed, then export your new PDF.
seo.faq_1_a: Yes, Tocify is completely free to use.
seo.faq_2_a: Yes. We process files locally using your browser's capabilities. Your confidential documents never leave your device.
seo.faq_3_a:
Tocify supports multiple models. You need to Bring Your Own API Keys.

Currently supported:
• Gemini: Get Key
• Qwen: Get Key
• Doubao: Get Key
• Zhipu: Get Key
seo.faq_4_q: Can Tocify run on the client side?
seo.faq_4_a:
Yes, we provide clients for macOS and Windows.
You can download them from the GitHub Releases page:
Download Releases
seo.faq_5_a:
• Ctrl + Z: Undo
• Ctrl + Shift + Z: Redo
• Up/Down Arrows: Quickly switch navigation input
• Mouse Drag: Drag TOC items / groups

star_request.title: Enjoying Tocify?
star_request.body: If this tool helped you, please consider giving us a star on GitHub or sharing your feedback!
